mods.abstract: Excerpt from a Louisiana Hayride radio program segment, featuring Norm Bale (announcer), Frank Page (announcer, host), Ferlin Husky (performer), Margie Singleton (performer), Charlie Walker (performer), Tony Douglas (performer), and Dobber Johnson (performer) on September 27, 1958 on radio station KWKH (Shreveport, La.)

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
